item.title: Feyfrost
item.description: Feyfrost is the province of Irrisen governed and populated by the cold fey who assisted the Witch Queen Baba Yaga during the Winter War of 3313 AR. The region is situated in the northeastern corner of the country, and is bordered by the Winterwall Glacier to the north, and the river known as the Frozen Road to the south. Although technically it is ruled by the redcap Mauxpaudi from the capital of Chillblight, it is actually governed by Chillblight's city council, as the Prince of Feyfrost is quite insane.[1]
